meanings.sent1: The shedder of tears was comforted by their friends.
meanings.sent2: The cat is a shedder of fur, leaving hair all over the house.
meanings.sent3: The shedder of responsibilities suddenly found themselves with more free time.
meanings.sent4: She was a shedder of light on the subject, revealing the truth.
meanings.sent5: The shedder of leaves in autumn creates a beautiful carpet on the ground.

meanings.definition: A tool or machine used for shedding
meanings.sent1: The garden shedder made quick work of cutting through branches.
meanings.sent2: The wood shedder is essential for preparing firewood in winter.
meanings.sent3: The shedder of old documents was a noisy but efficient machine.
meanings.sent4: The shedder of light on the situation helped us see things clearly.
meanings.sent5: The shedder of excess material ensured a precise cut every time.

meanings.definition: A person or animal that sheds hair or skin
meanings.sent1: The dog is a shedder, leaving a trail of fur wherever it goes.
meanings.sent2: As a cat shedder, she always had to vacuum to keep the house clean.
meanings.sent3: The shedder of skin cells was shedding more than usual due to stress.
meanings.sent4: The snake is a shedder of skin, revealing a shiny new layer underneath.
meanings.sent5: The shedder of hair was in need of a good grooming session.
